title: studio GROUP
description: Innovative image-making starts here.  studio Group represents models along with top-ranked, award-winning hair and makeup artists, stylists, creative directors, designers, videographers, spokespeople and producers. From a single talent to an entire team of experienced professionals, working with you from brainstorming to execution,  studio Group is your source for models and the best talent in fashion, beauty and entertainment.In response to the challenges faced by the advertising and publishing industries,  studio Group has evolved to better help clients gain and attract viewers. Though the mediums have changed, the goal remains the same: To provide inspiring, thoughtful and forward works of creativity.1444 Dupont St, Unit 37DTORONTO - (416) 504-1605
